They use the term 'BI analyst' but explain the workload of a 'data analyst' and a little bit of 'data engineer'. I'd be grateful if someone could explain clearly how they differentiate between both positions.

author: @Geomaverick124
text: I was thinking...you may not need a whole lot of projects in some of these certificates. Coursera has a ton of Guided Projects for various tools and applications...Tableau has 26; Power BI has over 50; and SQL has over 180 project courses. I know it is nice to have projects included in the certificate...but if they dont, you have the option of taking some of the course projects on the platform.
